comments.body: Yeah maybe. It's just that it's not super intuitive why we need to use `JavaUtils` in scala code when we could have used something from Spark's `Utils`. I'd rather err on the safe side of being verbose. Maybe I'll reword the comment a little to make it sound less stupid.
